column4: my update to gutsy was broken, how to i can return packages to feisty version?, I am connected via ssh to my VPS
downgrades aren't really supported, the results are "undefined"
i've cancelled the upgrade with ctrl+C, then my screen freeze into: root@vocho:~# dpkg --configure -a
can you run apt-get -f install  ?
i give this error: E: dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem.
ok, run that command
I run the command is delayed but rather "Configurando makedev ..." It is normal?
not sure what you meant to say there
the prompt is stop in: "Configurando makedev (2.3.1-83ubuntu3) ..."
it freezes there? Wait a bit, that one can take a while
ok thanks
a minute or two, no more I think
the prompt is still freezed :s
ok, try this:  dpkg -i /var/cache/apt/archives/makedev<tab>  <-- press the tab key
the prompt still are in "Configurando makedev...."
a sec
thanks!
this was a feisty to gutsy upgrade?
yes
I'm not finding anything about that in google or ubuntu bugs. I'm leaving work in a couple minutes to go home, I'll be back on in a couple hours if you're still working on this
ok very thanks man!
